title: League Crashes, I pay LP for it?
body: When we have a crash on the server side that prevents us from selecting champs, why am I still showing lost LP for a dodge?  Shouldn't there be an adjustment of LP back to accommodate for the server side crash?

replies.body: Loss Forgiven is enabled when there are server wide issues but only when such issue has been confirmed.

> [{quoted}](name=Rineyy,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=oa8vniji,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-18T07:11:08.005+0000)
>
> Loss Forgiven is enabled when there are server wide issues but only when such issue has been confirmed.

Loss forgiven doesn't stop the "you didn't pick, so you lose LP" from Leave Buster.
Are you having a specific issue with this happening? Your post didn't specify whether this was a question or a request for help with a technical issue.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=oa8vniji,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-09-19T23:33:55.215+0000)
>
> Are you having a specific issue with this happening? Your post didn't specify whether this was a question or a request for help with a technical issue.

I specified that I had lost LP due to an inability to select a champ.  So I was specific.

I wasn't able to find any recorded service issues around the time this post was made. When you disconnect from champion select, the server sees it as a dodge. Unfortunately, LP cannot be modified or adjusted after the server has recorded a loss/gain. If you're still having issues disconnecting from champ select, please let me know and we can work together to resolve it.

Let me know if you have any questions.
